member.name: T:KGySoft.ComponentModel.Design.AdvancedCollectionEditor
member.summary: A localizable editor of collection types that makes possible to edit the collection properties along with child elements. Override this editor to make possible to edit collections of abstract class elements.

member.name: M:KGySoft.ComponentModel.Design.AdvancedCollectionEditor.GetEditStyle(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext)
member.summary: Gets the editor style used by the method.
member.returns: A value that indicates the style of editor used by the method. If the does not support this method, then will return .
member.param: An that can be used to gain additional context information.

member.name: M:KGySoft.ComponentModel.Design.AdvancedCollectionEditor.EditValue(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.IServiceProvider,System.Object)
member.summary: Edits the specified object's value using the editor style indicated by the method.
member.returns: The new value of the object. If the value of the object has not changed, this should return the same object it was passed.
member.param: An that can be used to gain additional context information.
An that this editor can use to obtain services.

member.name: M:KGySoft.ComponentModel.Design.AdvancedCollectionEditor.OnBeforeEditCollection(System.Collections.IList)
member.summary: Called before editing collection.

member.name: P:KGySoft.ComponentModel.Design.AdvancedCollectionEditor.TypeSelectorElements
member.summary: If overridden along with method and returns a non-null value, then a combo box will be appeared above Add button where user can select type of added element. May be useful if element type in edited collection is abstract.

member.name: P:KGySoft.ComponentModel.Design.AdvancedCollectionEditor.ElementType
member.summary: Override this property if edited collection is not array or a generic collection type, or when element type is abstract and is not overridden. Thus the staticly added element type can be defined.

member.name: P:KGySoft.ComponentModel.Design.AdvancedCollectionEditor.CollectionItemType
member.summary: Gets the data type of each item in the collection.

member.name: P:KGySoft.ComponentModel.Design.AdvancedCollectionEditor.CollectionType
member.summary: Gets the data type of the collection object.

member.name: P:KGySoft.ComponentModel.Design.AdvancedCollectionEditor.CanEditSelfProperties
member.summary: By default, editing self properties is allowed. To disable it override this property and return false.

member.name: M:KGySoft.ComponentModel.Design.AdvancedCollectionEditor.GetDisplayText(System.Object)
member.summary: Obtains the name of the object. Override to return a specific name. Should display both the name of the collection and collection items.

member.name: M:KGySoft.ComponentModel.Design.AdvancedCollectionEditor.DestroyInstance(System.Object)
member.summary: Called when a collection item is about to be destroyed. By default handles components and instances. Override this method to perform more specific tasks.

member.name: M:KGySoft.ComponentModel.Design.AdvancedCollectionEditor.CanRemoveInstance(System.Object)
member.summary: Override to handle whether an instance can be removed or not.

member.name: M:KGySoft.ComponentModel.Design.AdvancedCollectionEditor.CanAddInstance(System.Collections.IList,System.Object,System.String@)
member.summary: Override to handle whether an instance can be added or not.

member.name: M:KGySoft.ComponentModel.Design.AdvancedCollectionEditor.CreateInstance(System.Type)
member.summary: Override to adjust instance creation.

member.name: M:KGySoft.ComponentModel.Design.AdvancedCollectionEditor.CreateInstance(System.String)
member.summary: Override this method along with property to make element creation possible via type selection.

member.name: M:KGySoft.ComponentModel.Design.AdvancedCollectionEditor.SetTypeDescriptorContext(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext)
member.summary: Sets a new type descriptor context. Default is .

member.name: M:KGySoft.ComponentModel.Design.AdvancedCollectionEditor.OnChangesCanceled(System.Collections.IList)
member.summary: Override to do any special handling on canceled editing.

member.name: M:KGySoft.ComponentModel.Design.AdvancedCollectionEditor.OnChangesCommited(System.Collections.IList)
member.summary: Override to do any special handling on applied editing.

member.name: M:KGySoft.ComponentModel.Design.AdvancedCollectionEditor.CommitChanges(System.Collections.IList,System.Object[])
member.summary: Called when the changes of the editing is about to be applied.
member.param: The edited collection. When this method called, contains the original instances after the editing. Destroying of the removed instances is called separately.
The new items to be applied to the collection.

member.name: M:KGySoft.ComponentModel.Design.AdvancedCollectionEditor.CancelChanges(System.Collections.IList,System.Object[])
member.summary: Called when the changes of the editing is about to be canceled. Restoring of the self properties is called separately.
member.param: The edited collection. When this method called, contains the original instances after the editing.
A copy of the original items to be applied to the collection.

member.name: M:KGySoft.ComponentModel.Design.AdvancedCollectionEditor.SaveSelfProperties(System.Collections.IList)
member.summary: Saves self properties of edited collection instance without the contained elements in the collection. Override to perform a specific and optimized implementation or when self properties cannot be serialized. By default saves public read-write properties by serialization. Called only when returns .
member.returns: Any data that can be restored by .
member.exception: A property cannot be serialized. In such case override this method and implement your own solution.

member.name: M:KGySoft.ComponentModel.Design.AdvancedCollectionEditor.RestoreSelfProperties(System.Collections.IList,System.Object)
member.summary: Restores self properties of edited collection instance without the contained elements in the collection. Override to perform a specific and optimized implementation or when self properties cannot be serialized. Called only when returns .
member.exception: A property cannot be serialized. In such case override this method and implement your own solution.

member.name: M:KGySoft.ComponentModel.Design.AdvancedCollectionEditor.CloneElement(System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a copy of an element in the edited collection. Override this method for best optimized implementation. Needed for restoring items if edit is canceled. This method is called only when collection is not read-only. To save/restore read-only collections you might to override and methods.
member.param: An element of the edited collection.
member.returns: A copy of the edited element.
member.remarks: The base implementation creates a copy of the element by method.

member.name: M:KGySoft.ComponentModel.Design.AdvancedCollectionEditor.IsCollectionReadOnly(System.Collections.IList)
member.summary: Determines whether the editor should treat the as a read only one. The elements of a read-only collection cannot be removed, inserted and re-ordered; however, the elements itself can be edited. Affects only the elements; for the self properties use the property.
member.returns: , if the collection is read-only; otherwise, .

member.name: M:KGySoft.ComponentModel.Design.AdvancedCollectionEditor.IsCollectionFixedSize(System.Collections.IList)
member.summary: Determines whether the editor should treat the as a fixed-size one. If a non read-only collection has a fixed size, only reordering of the elements is allowed.
member.returns: , if the collection has a fixed size; otherwise, .

member.name: T:KGySoft.ComponentModel.Design.AdvancedCollectionEditorWithoutSelfProperties
member.summary: A simple overridden class of where editing of self properties are disabled.

member.name: T:KGySoft.ComponentModel.Design.MacroTextEditor
member.summary: Base class of text editors of string properties that may contain macros. Derived classes must define the usable macros and whether the text is single- or multiline. Editor is localizable.

member.summary: Macro info

member.name: P:KGySoft.ComponentModel.Design.MacroTextEditor.IsMultiline
member.summary: Gets whether the editor control is multiline or not.

member.summary: A form that makes possible to edit a collection object along with self properties. Controls and descriptions are localized.
